outcome: The Technocratic Purists proclaim system restoration, hiding increased surveillance.

events.description: Technocratic Purists claim full restoration of BCI, insisting citizen scores are fair and accurate.
Government analysts report significant increase in data collection methods as surveillance intensifies.
Internal communications within the Purists reveal plans to maintain new surveillance levels permanently.
All citizens receive mandatory updates detailing improved BCI guidelines amidst heightened monitoring.
